summary: From playing this amazing game i got inspired to make a preset because unlike witcher the game has much less mods inspired from it.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#980000][size=6][b][i]Red[/i][/b][/size][/color][/center] Not a very lore-friendly preset (because Red is in a steam punk theme area) but use how you will

I put a link (due to no immediate spoilers) to the transistor story wiki if you don't mind spoilers to the game and want to know about the character which i strongly urge you to do.

[img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/70518-1-1444597888.jpg[/img]

[url=http://transistor.gamepedia.com/The_Story/]Transistor Story[/url]

[youtube]-zA1jRmAYfU[/youtube]


Why is this not in my Stache Presets?:
Simply because its not "lore-friendly" so I just keep it separate. Were as the others can have a good back story.

And as Always please Enjoy :)
author: MrMustache123456
